Message:
...How many times does
that make, I wonder?

As the fervor of
the Witch Hunt grew,
so too did everyone’s
caution towards witches.

More and more
patients interrupted,
or simply refused my healing.

I had prepared myself
for such prejudice, but...
...No, I can’t let it get to me!

If a healer gives up,
no one can be healed.
I need to stay strong...!

I know! As long as I hide
the fact that I’m a witch...
there’s still a way
I can heal people.

That idea was what led me
to start healing people
without the help of magic.

...I only use my magic for good,
so why should I have to hide it?

Thoughts like those
crossed my mind more
times than I could count,

but I desperately tried to
drown them out by focusing
solely on my healing.

There were many people
who would’ve healed
faster with my magic,
but there was no other way.
After all, witches are...
